text: Based on my knowledge we can't do that.

Hey everyone,
I have a question regarding the SMS add-on and workflows. While it's possible to send a personalized SMS to a contact from their contact owner using tokens like the contact's name and a meeting link, I'm wondering if there's a way to build a workflow triggered by SMS replies.
Ideally, Iâ€™d like to set up a workflow where, if a contact replies to a text message, it triggers an automated email to the contact owner with a personalized message, such as:
"Hey [Contact Owner], [Contact Name] just replied to your text message: '[Text Body].'"
Has anyone worked on something similar or know if this is achievable?
Thanks in advance for your help!
I am trying to use a workflow to auto associate a lead to a deal, any suggestions?
